profil module¶

Created on Tue Jan 29 12:42:34 2019

@author: draz

class profil.SimulationModel(assumptions, number_of_lp, power_nominal, dis_ev_arr, dis_year, control, storage_capacity=None, co2_scenario=None, dis_battery_size=None, dis_soc=None, dis_user_type=None, trafo_preload=None)¶

Bases: object

Simulation instance.

Parameters

  • assumptions (dict) – Simulation configurations.

  • number_of_lp (int) – Amount of charging points in the charging infrastructure.

  • power_kw (float) – Power of each charging point in kW.

  • dis_ev_arr (list) – Hourly arrival distribution for one week. Values from 0 to 1, where 1 means arrivals and 0 no arrivals.

  • dis_year – Total amount of car arrivals within simulation time.

  • dis_year – int

  • control (str) – Control Strategy (‘UC’, ‘FD’, ‘FCFS’, ‘WS’, ‘OPT’) as per assumptions.

  • storage_capacity (float) – Capacity of the storage (in kW).

  • co2_scenario (int) – Position of the CO2_Scenario in the scenario list in assumptions.

  • dis_battery_size (list) – Distribution of the battery sizes accorting to the input file.

  • dis_soc (list) – Distribution of the SOCs at the arrival time of the vehicles according to the input file.

  • dis_user_type (list) – Distribution of the user types specified in the input file. Each user type is having a minimal and maximal parking time.

  • trafo_preload (float) – Preload of the transformer the charging infrastructure is connected to.

Variables

  • number_of_lp – Number of charging points for the simulation.

  • power_nominal – Nominal power of the charging points.

  • type_lp – AC or DC charging for the charging points.

  • control – Control Strategy (‘UC’, ‘FD’, ‘FCFS’, ‘WS’, ‘OPT’) as per assumptions.

  • dis_ev_arr – Distribution of the vehicle arrivals.

  • dis_year – Total amount of car arrivals over simulation time.

  • dis_battery_size – Distribution of the battery capacitites.

  • dis_soc – Distribtion of the SOC at arrival time.

  • dis_user_type – Distribution of the user types (parking time).

  • simulation_time – Total amount of time steps.

  • trafo_preload – Time series data of the transformer pre-load.

  • co2_emission – Time series data of the CO2 emissions.

  • energy_price – Time series data of the energy price.

  • assumptions – The assumptions specified in main.

  • connected_evs – Time series data with the amount of connected vehicles for every time step.

  • arrivals – List of all times a car arrives.

  • tau – Length of a time step in minutes.

  • charging_points – List containing all chargin points as instances of chargingpoint.

  • vehicles – Dictionary containing all connected ev IDs with their instance of vehicle.

  • storage_capacity – Capacity of the battery of the station in kWh.

  • storage – Instance of storage.

  • served_ev – Counter of all vehicles connected and charged.

profile_ev_load(fix_key)¶

Generate charging points, and arrivals. Assign power to each charging point based on control strategy.

Parameters

fix_key (int) – 1 fixes the assumptions. 0 generates new assumptions every simulation.
